# Mofin Next.js - Deployment Guide

## ðŸš€ Quick Deploy Options

### Option 1: Vercel (Recommended - Free)

1. Visit: https://vercel.com/new
2. Import from GitHub: `harvey-wayan-ai/mofin-nextjs`
3. Click "Deploy"
4. Done! Live in ~2 minutes

**Live URL:** `https://mofin-nextjs.vercel.app` (auto-generated)

### Option 2: Netlify

1. Visit: https://app.netlify.com/start
2. Connect GitHub repo
3. Build command: `npm run build`
4. Publish directory: `.next`
5. Deploy

### Option 3: Local Development

```bash
cd /root/clawd/harvey-projects/mofin-nextjs
npm install
npm run dev
# Visit: http://localhost:3000
```
